definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: dangle, shake (Targum [[[נוט]]] Aph. scare, sld., Levy:Ch WB ii. 97 Jastr:Dict. 886; Ar. nawt.un a bag hanging down, na0t.a suspend, hang);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תָּנוּט]] Ps 99:1 let (the earth) shake (‖[[רָגַז]]).—Ol We prop. [[תָּמוּג]].
